p: In research related to traditional herbal medicine (THM), network pharmacology (NP) is a useful tool for exploring the potential mechanisms of therapeutic effects that act on multiple targets. Lee et al. constructed the networks of co-author and affiliation to analyze the trend of methodologies utilized by researchers [ 4]. Firstly, they found a dramatic increase in THM-NP studies in the last ten years. Additionally, the Traditional Chinese Medicine Systems Pharmacology Database and Analysis Platform was the most frequently utilized, and the methodology for constructing a compound-target network had achieved the greatest progress.
